[File: aptos-core/types/src/move_any.rs] [Function: Any::unpack()] [Phantom type parameter] If the Move type uses phantom type parameters for access control (e.g., capabilities), can `Any` bypass these by unpacking with wrong phantom parameters? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/move_any.rs] [Struct: Any] [State synchronization] When new validators sync state containing `Any` objects, can differences in Rust/BCS library versions cause deserialization mismatches that break state sync? (High)
